description:
Want to make some extra Cash? Learn how to make money at home by turning second-hand clothes into boutique clothing that you can sell for top dollar.

Sewing Boutique Children's Clothes is narrated by Kerri Anne, and expert in creating remanufactured, boutique clothing for children. Kerri will walk you through three projects step-by-step, explaining each procedure with detail. The video tutorials feature close up shots to help you understand each technique with perfect clarity. The techniques demonstrated can be used to develop your own unique style, patterns and collection.

As well as the Udemy 30 day guarantee, you have my personal promise that you will be wowed and delighted by what you'll learn in the next couple hours. If you're not happy, enjoy a full refund, no questions asked.

Don't delay. You could be turning rags into riches right now. Enrol in the course today.

**This course was updated February 2015.
title: Turn childrenâ€™s second had clothes into boutique dollars
